ajaxbrowser.common module¶

Common helper functions

class ajaxbrowser.common.ConsoleHandler[source]¶

Bases: logging.StreamHandler

Log to stderr for errors else stdout

emit(record)[source]¶
ajaxbrowser.common.get_logger(output_file, level=20, maxbytes=0)[source]¶

Create a logger instance

output_file:
file where to save the log
level:
the minimum logging level to save
maxbytes:
the maxbytes allowed for the log file size. 0 means no limit.
ajaxbrowser.common.most_common(l)[source]¶

Returns the most common element in this list

>>> most_common([1,2,3,4,5,3,2,2,4,5,4,2,2,1,1,1,1,1,1])
1
ajaxbrowser.common.parse_proxy(proxy)[source]¶

Parse a proxy into its fragments Returns a dict with username, password, host, and port

>>> f = parse_proxy('login:pw@66.197.208.200:8080')
>>> f.username
'login'
>>> f.password
'pw'
>>> f.host
'66.197.208.200'
>>> f.port
'8080'
>>> f = parse_proxy('66.197.208.200')
>>> f.username == f.password == f.port == ''
True
>>> f.host
'66.197.208.200'
ajaxbrowser.common.remove_tags(html)[source]¶

Remove tags from this html string

ajaxbrowser.common.to_ascii(html)[source]¶

Return ascii part of html

ajaxbrowser.common.to_float(s, default=0.0)[source]¶

Return float from this string

>>> to_float('90.45')
90.45
>>> to_float('')
0.0
>>> to_float('90')
90.0
>>> to_float('..9')
0.0
>>> to_float('.9')
0.9
>>> to_float(None)
0.0
>>> to_float(1)
1.0
ajaxbrowser.common.to_int(s, default=0)[source]¶

Return integer from this string

>>> to_int('90')
90
>>> to_int('-90.2432')
-90
>>> to_int('a90a')
90
>>> to_int('a')
0
>>> to_int('a', 90)
90
ajaxbrowser.common.to_unicode(obj, encoding='utf-8')[source]¶

Convert obj to unicode

ajaxbrowser.common.unescape(text, encoding='utf-8')[source]¶

Interpret escape characters

>>> unescape('&lt;hello&nbsp;&amp;%20world&gt;')
'<hello & world>'
